content: Our Q2 steel selling price averaged $1,487 per net ton, representing an over $40 quarter-over-quarter increase, primarily driven by substantially higher slap prices sold to other steel mills, and favorable April fixed price sales contract renewals, as well as continued robust spreads for cold rolled, coated and plate products sold on an index basis. Your line is now live. Your line is now live. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Your line is now live. Thank you very much. Your line is now live. Your line is now live.
